price: ߊ߬ ߟߊߛߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߛߍ߬ߓߍ ߓߘߊ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߡߣߊ߬ߡߣߊ ߓߘߊ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߸ ߓߊ ߡߣߊ߬ߡߣߊ ߞߍߣߍ߲߫ ߝߏߕߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَقُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqul jāa al-ḥaqu wazahaqa al-bāṭilu inna al-bāṭila kāna zahūqan
